argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lubsn.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | lubsn.u | |- U = ( lub ` K ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( join ` K ) = ( join ` K ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B ) -> K e. Lat ) |
| 5 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B ) -> X e. B ) |
| 6 | 2, 3, 4, 5, 5 | #P_joinval | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B ) -> ( X ( join ` K ) X ) = ( U ` { X , X } ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_dfsn2 | |- { X } = { X , X } |
| 8 | 7 | #P_fveq2i | |- ( U ` { X } ) = ( U ` { X , X } ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_syl6reqr | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B ) -> ( U ` { X } ) = ( X ( join ` K ) X ) ) |
| 10 | 1, 3 | #P_latjidm | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B ) -> ( X ( join ` K ) X ) = X ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B ) -> ( U ` { X } ) = X ) |
